attributes.description: All cars are mechanically checked and Dekra certified. Test Drives are available and welcome subject to availability. Nationwide deliveries can be arranged. We buy and will trade-in your car. On floor finance and insurance manager (NCA & FSB approved). Balance of factory warranty and/or comprehensive warranties available. With over 65 years of managerial retail experience we are here to assist you through the entire vehicle purchasing process, from inquiry to delivery.

attributes.description:
Not to be missed. Very neat and well looked after vehicle.
Power Steering, Aircon, and Abs. Remainder of Service Plan, Remainder of Warranty, Service History.  PROFESSIONAL and ACCREDITED finance and insurance (F&I) managers are at hand to advise you regarding finance with all of the major banks. All trade-ins welcome. Test drives welcome, Extended warranties and service plans available On the Road, License, Registration and Number plates NOT included. We deliver country wide. 
We do a 114 point check and roadworthy test  on all our vehicles to ensure your safety and satisfaction.

attributes.description:
Finance can be arranged, Excludes administration, delivery and license registration fees, 80 point quality check, Very neat, Trade-ins accepted, Test drives welcome, Nationwide delivery.

Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bryanston.
attributes.finance_estimate:
Estimated monthly payment is R 12 310.00 over 72 months with 10% deposit of R 69 990.00 at a rate of 12% (PRIME + 3%).

* Please note that these calculations are only estimates and must be confirmed with your finance provider.

attributes.description:
.REPLY NOW TO SECURE THIS VEHICLE !!!
SPOTLESS VEHICLE ALL ROUND!!!
ALL VEHICLES SOLD ARE SUBJECT TO THE FOLLOWING:
•	AA DEKRA ROADWORTHY TEST
•	AUTOMARK TEST
•	TRADE- INS WELCOME / BUY – INS WELCOME
•	GUARANTEED  STRUCTURAL  ACCIDENT- FREE
IN-HOUSE FINANCE AVAILABLE ON ALL MAKES AND MODELS
PRICING EXCLUDES ON THE ROAD CHARGES
REQUIREMENTS FOR FINANCE:
•	COPY OF ID DOCUMENT
•	COPY OF DRIVERS LICENSE
•	3 LATEST PAYSLIPS
•	PROOF OF ADDRESS 
•	3 MONTH’S BANK STATEMENTS
CALL TODAY FOR THE BEST SERVICE AROUND.
MOTUS TOYOTA CAPE GATE 
CNR. OKAVANGO RD & LANGEBERG RIDGE RD.
BRACKENFELL/ KRAAIFONTEIN /CAPE TOWN
Some pics are for display purposes only.
Mileage may change on demo models!!!
